headline: Vehicle Service Group to Expand Manufacturing Capacity in Madison, Indiana
summary: Vehicle Service Group (VSG), part of Dover (NYSE: DOV) and leading manufacturer of vehicle lifting and repair equipment, today announced an over $5 million investment in its Madison, Indiana, facility to support the installation of a state-of-the-art automated production line.
